catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 218
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: small six-panel screen; group of people picnicking on red blanket along a shore at R; another group of picnickers near UC between trees, with horseback rider nearby; arched bridge with tree nearby at L; another group of people on bench at L; man entering shine complex at L
medium: Ink and light color on paper
title: Sumiyoshi Shrine and Osaka Bay
